name: baguette
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long, thin stick of white bread, of a type that originally came from France
Valengilda/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
UK a baguette, or part of a baguette, that is filled with cold food such as meat, cheese, or salad, and eaten as a sandwich: a ham and cheese baguette
Floortje/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
